RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 1 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 68. Claiming Purse 17800. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE JUNE 21, 2022. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Since May 21 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since Then Allo wed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: OL' NED good start, dueled to the turn, took over into stretch ridden out. UPGRADE AL dueled winner to the turn, proved no match, held place spot. THE PINK Z raced along evenly throughout with no late kick in the stretch. HONOR THE D no speed to the stretch run, closed the gap while no threat. SERENDIPITOUS never menaced. STREAKY had a steady fade throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Upgrade Al
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled winner to the turn, proved no match, held place spot

ENTRY.NAME: The Pink Z
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly throughout with no late kick in the stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Serendipitous
ENTRY.OWNER: WinStar Farm LLC and Blazing Meadows Farm LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: never menaced

ENTRY.NAME: Ol' Ned
ENTRY.COMMENT: good start, dueled to the turn, took over into stretch ridden out

ENTRY.NAME: Honor the D
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed to the stretch run, closed the gap while no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Streaky
ENTRY.COMMENT: had a steady fade throughout

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 2 1M Dirt CR: 67. Claiming Purse 9000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE DECEMBER 21, 2022. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TRAUMARAMA hustled along inside to track leaders to the half, rallied from the far turn and stretch to clear in the late going. DANCE THE DAY AWAY outside position to far turn, between horses into stretch for 2nd. LA MAMA CHULA speed from between horses into first turn, led to far turn showed. LIVE IT UP no speed early, rallied off rail into the far turn, improved late. HERO OF THE BEST chased pace to far turn, could not go on and weakened stretch. CELESTIAL ORB never factored throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Traumarama
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled along inside track leaders to the half, rallied to clear

ENTRY.NAME: La Mama Chula
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed from between horses into first turn, led to far turn showed

ENTRY.NAME: Hero of the Best
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace to far turn, could not go on and weakened stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Celestial Orb
ENTRY.COMMENT: never factored throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Live It Up
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed early, rallied off rail into the far turn, improved late

ENTRY.NAME: Dance the Day Away
ENTRY.COMMENT: outside position to far turn, between horses into stretch for 2nd

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 79. Allowance Purse 18000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Since May 21 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races Not Considered In Allowanc es) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JILL BABE steadied after the start, tracked leaders to turn, rallied into the stretch run and went clear late while ridden out. CAMI CAT sent to the front, set pace to stretch, no match in late going. TRULY A DREAM trailed to the stretch, passed a couple for show spot late. FOR THE BISCUIT chased leader to the turn, could not keep up and faded back. SPARE A DIME never a real menace throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Spare a Dime
ENTRY.COMMENT: never a real menace throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Cami Cat
ENTRY.COMMENT: sent to the front, set pace to stretch, no match in late going

ENTRY.NAME: Jill Babe
ENTRY.COMMENT: steadied after the start, tracked leaders to turn went clear late

ENTRY.NAME: Truly a Dream
ENTRY.OWNER: AOM Racing Stables LLC and Diamond Hands Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed to the stretch, passed a couple for show spot late

ENTRY.NAME: For the Biscuit
ENTRY.OWNER: Spadone Emil John and Stephenson Kate
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased leader to the turn, could not keep up and faded back

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 55. Maiden Claiming Purse 9000. FOR MAIDENS, THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: VAMOS ANTONIO unhurried to the turn, circled field, kept on three wide prevail. FLOYD G broke awkward, rushed inside to duel, opened up, run down. BUDDHA BOY off rail run to turn while going evenly throughout for show spot. ALPHA LEA trailed to the turn from inside, passed one in the stretch. BOOSTERIZED flashed brief speed from inside with nothing left to the turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Boosterized
ENTRY.COMMENT: flashed brief speed from inside with nothing left to the turn

ENTRY.NAME: Alpha Lea
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed to the turn from inside, passed one in the stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Floyd G
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke awkward, rushed inside to duel, opened up, run down

ENTRY.NAME: Vamos Antonio
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried to the turn, circled field, kept on three wide prevail

ENTRY.NAME: Buddha Boy
ENTRY.COMMENT: off rail run to turn while going evenly throughout for show spot

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 65. Maiden Claiming Purse 13000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LADA KALINA sharp speed to the front, well handled throughout, held sway while ridden out to the wire. WRITTEN CONSENT chased winner throughout to no avail, while well clear of rest. CORTADO raced on evenly throughout for the show spot. STRONG DEMAND chased leaders from outside to the stretch with nothing left late. FLATTER ME ZEN through early from inside. MACI'S GEMSTONE bobbled start, never menaced throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Flatter Me Zen
ENTRY.COMMENT: through early from inside

ENTRY.NAME: Maci's Gemstone
ENTRY.OWNER: Short Tommy C and Heyer Robert
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled start, never menaced throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Lada Kalina
ENTRY.COMMENT: sharp speed to the front, well handled throughout, held sway

ENTRY.NAME: Cortado
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced on evenly throughout for the show spot

ENTRY.NAME: Strong Demand
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased leaders from outside to the stretch with nothing left late

ENTRY.NAME: Written Consent
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased winner throughout to no avail, while well clear of rest

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 6 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 93. Starter Allowance Purse 14400. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races At A Mile Or Over Since May 21 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs . (Claiming Races For $7,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $10,000). (If transferred to the Main Track, this race will be run at One Mile and 70 Yards.) (Ra il at 14 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RAISON KARTER rated just off leaders to the half, took over and ran clear late. SUBDUED settled nicely pressed leader to far turn, edged back, no match. CAROM good position throughout with no late spurt when needed late. CAPPY HOUR inside speed to the front, battled gamely to far turn, gave in.

ENTRY.NAME: Cappy Hour
ENTRY.OWNER: Adams James M and Cox Christopher J
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside speed to the front, battled gamely to far turn, gave in

ENTRY.NAME: Subdued
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled nicely pressed leader to far turn, edged back, no match

ENTRY.NAME: Carom
ENTRY.OWNER: Molumby John and Susan Anderson LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: good position throughout with no late spurt when needed late

ENTRY.NAME: Raison Karter
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated just off leaders to the half, took over and ran clear late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 7 1M Dirt CR: 83. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 17700. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $8,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023 OR OPTIONAL CLAIMING PRICE OF $15,000. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races At A Mile Or Over Since M ay 21, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000 (Claiming Races For $10,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $10,000).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SILKY WARRIOR (IRE) unhurried early, rallied at the half, kept on nicely and cleared off. HOT DAME speed to the front, stayed to quarter pole, outsprinted, no match. MISS MOON PIE raced along evenly to far turn, circled field into stretch evenly. MAUREENLOVESFRANK saved ground throughout with no response while evenly. FOOT RUB LOVE reared at the start, lost best chance, never factored throughout. OFF THE CHARTS chased leader to the half with nothing left and faltered back.

ENTRY.NAME: Maureenlovesfrank
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground throughout with no response while evenly

ENTRY.NAME: Hot Dame
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed to the front, stayed to quarter pole, outsprinted, no match

ENTRY.NAME: Off the Charts
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased leader to the half with nothing left and faltered back

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Moon Pie
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly to far turn, circled field into stretch evenly

ENTRY.NAME: Foot Rub Love
ENTRY.COMMENT: reared at the start, lost best chance, never factored throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Silky Warrior (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, rallied at the half, kept on nicely, cleared off

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 8 5F Dirt CR: 77. Claiming Purse 12200. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Since May 21 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500 (Claiming Races For $5,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $6,500). (If transferred to the Main Track, this race will be run at Five Furlongs.) (Rail at 14 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SOFIA STRONG chased leader to the turn, dueled into stretch and stayed on gamely to the wire. HOWIZEE broke sharp, reserved to turn, ranged up off rail best of rest. WARIS inside run to stretch angled out into the stretch for show spot. OUT ATTHE SPEEDWAY raced along evenly throughout with no late bid when needed. FIVE QUEENS never menaced. LITTLE LUCERITO through early, dropped back readily. LA SMOOCHIE inside speed to the quarter pole, gave way readily in stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Waris
ENTRY.OWNER: Rowena Beck Racing Stable LLC and Mayfield Jr Frank
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside run to stretch angled out into the stretch for show spot

ENTRY.NAME: Sofia Strong
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased leader to the turn, dueled into stretch, gamely to wire

ENTRY.NAME: La Smoochie
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside speed to the quarter pole, gave way readily in stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Out Atthe Speedway
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly throughout with no late bid when needed

ENTRY.NAME: Howizee
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharp, reserved to turn, ranged up off rail best of rest

ENTRY.NAME: Five Queens
ENTRY.COMMENT: never menaced

ENTRY.NAME: Little Lucerito
ENTRY.COMMENT: through early, dropped back readily
